name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"81d6929e-ea79-4a3a-8291-92c8ad8de794","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: resolve","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"265ab462-9ce0-45d2-9608-2e81b1c94be8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the primary semantic dispatcher used to determine the final, concrete target of a namespace string. It bridges the gap between a raw identifier (like a variable or function name) and the actual underlying entity it represents. Depending on whether the target is a class, a function, a literal, or a reference variable, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" applies specific logic to return a list of actionable namespaces that the system can then "call" or "access."","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0568439b-97b0-4cb7-ac84-8b2ac4ec40d4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis frequently encounters ambiguous names. A string like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" could refer to a local variable, a global function, or an imported class. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" acts as the intelligence layer that evaluates the "type" of the definition. It is essential for inter-procedural analysis because it correctly handles specialized Python cases—for example, knowing that calling a Class (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") should actually resolve to its ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method if a constructor call is being simulated (controlled by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flag","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" parameter).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eaac9853-26ea-4c3f-a698-753146cee976","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"601df705-e57f-4065-8cfc-9bc0be493bbb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Definition Lookup:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It attempts to retrieve the formal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for the provided namespace string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2204707-d2b0-4b31-9e50-2396cabe3acd","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Built-in Handling:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks if the string contains markers for built-in types (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<list>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). If so, it returns the string directly as a resolved target.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c3f66418-ca91-41b2-a36c-1ee160d79b0e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reference Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the definition is a "pointer" type (like a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PARAM_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"RETURN_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it delegates to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to trace the variable back to its actual value source.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5fbf5398-1de6-4ed8-96fd-2c58f6c1c11e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type-Specific Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"fd93eb65-eb52-4ffa-b722-eac5b57f6399","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Functions/External Defs:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Returns the namespace as-is, as these are terminal callable targets.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"870a9426-6ca8-4ea8-a625-1bb08f664d31","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Classes:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flag","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it appends ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the result to redirect the call to the constructor; otherwise, it returns the class namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6e4ced19-6d24-48d7-9d05-179573729a68","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Literals:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Normalizes standard Python types into internal tags like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<list>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ccd72252-a48d-4ac1-9aca-da3ee1239862","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalization:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Returns a deduplicated list of the final resolved namespaces.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0121e93-a6ce-4e25-b785-36c135ae3027","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example 20)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"062cdfea-eb72-488f-bc7a-fb0526d501c8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" reveals ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_var","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was assigned the class ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at line 5.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"62b9d6cf-a96d-4f74-b7da-40c3534a5100","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then processes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"501092e9-9991-4ce5-88cb-92737fdfe578","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_var()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["module.User.__init__"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5e4def42-344d-4b48-a751-72b092b7a6b5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
